explanation: [0-0] In front of the gate of a brick building, a boy in a red shirt and a girl in a black and white checkered shirt, both barefoot, are standing in front of the gate. A man in a brown shirt is standing aside, holding a garland in his hand and smiling.

[0-7] Then a man in a yellow shirt walks out of the door, the boy and the girl are happily throwing flowers. The man in the brown shirt puts the garland on the man who came out of the door, and the man in the brown shirt clears the way for him. Then the man in the yellow shirt stands on the roof with his hands raised high.
